mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT (PNO, PNAME, PRICE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT.nextval, #{pname}, #{price}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT SET PNAME = #{pname}, PRICE = #{price}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer} WHERE PNO = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT PNO, PNAME, PRICE, CONTENT, WRITER FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE PNO > 0 ORDER BY PNO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT + 1 WHERE PNO = #{pno}
